        Fetch an environment with the specified id.

        java.util.List<Environment> fetchLikeName(java.lang.String name)
        Fetch environments with the specified name using a likeness check.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the environment
        Returns:
        environments with a name like name or an empty list

      • fetchByName

        Environment fetchByName(java.lang.String name)
        Fetch an environment with the specified name using an equality check. May or may not be case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the environment
        Returns:
        an environment with that name or null

      • fetchByCreature

        java.util.List<Environment> fetchByCreature(int creatureId)
        Fetches the environments the specified creature can live in.
        Parameters:
        creatureId - the creature id
        Returns:
        the list of environments for that creature, or an empty list
